item.title: Resolving the Unavailable Code Sign Default Timestamp Server http://timestamp.verisign.com/scripts/timstamp.dll
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: This article describes how to resolve issues with the unavailable Verisign timestamp server, providing alternative timestamp server addresses to help developers successfully complete code signing.
